tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Adarsh is very qualified and professional. 
Dr listens to your concerns and explains what is the best treatment can be given or done and talks to patient through every step of the checkup and treatment process which is very important for patient to understand. So far I am done RCT and feel comfortable. Once I am done with all my sessions I would review more but surely recommending Dr.Adarsh for any sorts of dental treatment.

Thanks Team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have checked so many doctors in Google search engine and finally found Dr. Adarsh. Already I have filled one of my teeth due to cavity before two years and that doctor suggested me root canal but I was scared to do all those because so many people told it will pain and the procedure was tough so I just left. Recently I had mild pain and came to doctor adarsh he checked and told RC to be done and staffs in the clinic well explained about the RC treatment, finally I agreed to take this treatment because I got some infections also and I don't want to lose my teeth. You people will never believe, there is some magic in doctors hand... I went for about 6-7 sitting due to my infection and finally done my RC.  There is no pain at all. I strongly suggest this clinic for people like me who is getting scared for injections, blood etc., PAINLESS TREATMENT. Thank u so much Dr adarshüôè and staffs who are friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,
review:
This is a great place to go take care of your teeth.
My dentist friend referred me to Dr. Adarsh for dental care. I used to travel from Indiranagar to the clinic for treatment. The team was very professional examining and providing with solutions by priority. I had to do root cleaning and fill in 7 teeth. Dr. Anshida did a great job, I felt that I was in good hands. All the people here were very gentle and kind to me. They explained very well what was going on. Thanks to Dr Anshida and team Adarsh dental care!üôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am extremely Happy with Dr Adarsh. I have to Thank Practo for Introducing Dr Adarsh. 

I was desperately looking for a Good Doctor as I had a very Bad experience with my Previous Doctor Dr. Dharma (from Sai Dental Specialities Chamarajpet).

I am very Glad that I found Dr Adarsh and I also introduced My Wife for dental Issues and Currently she is also taking Treatment under Dr Adarsh.

My Journey with Dr Adarsh has started  and will be recommending  Friends & Family to Dr. Adarsh Advanced Dental Care in Chamrajpet.

Again, I Sincerely Thank Practo for helping me to introduce to Dr. Adarsh Advanced Dental Care in Chamrajpet.

Our Dr Adarsh is very good in explaining the situation and suggesting the Best and effective Treatment that is need for Dental issues.

I Sincerely recommend to all and I give a 5 star Rating to our Dr Adarsh.
